channel.title: Run.bat
channel.description:
Solved = No :(
Question = I kept on running 'Run.bat' then my brother reinstled Java and now it does not work i have made sure the Envitment things are right and it is :P but when i open 'run.bat it just closses and jes i have JDk Update 14 Code in 'Run.Bat' =
[code]@echo off color 81 title Devil From Heaven java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.14-ga-bin.jar[/code]
Compiler that works :p = [code] @echo off Title Devil From Heaven Updater "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin\javac.exe" *.java pause [/code]

item.title: Run.bat
item.description:
@11167 wrote:

Go to Google, and type this in:
‘java’ is not recognized as an internal or external command,
operable program or batch file.
It’ll tell you to set your Environment Variables. If you go to the tutorial section, The Soul has a stickied tutorial including these.

Read full topic

item.title: Run.bat
item.dc:creator: @_Devil : Devil :
item.description:
@_Devil wrote:

code given = Yes

Error =

'java' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. Press any key to continue . . .

I Kept On Trying and Nothing Help me Plz
Thanks
Devil

Read full topic

item.title: Run.bat
item.description:
@11167 wrote:

Well you’re running your server through a MySql connector jar file. Make it to this:

@echo off color 81 title Devil From Heaven java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.14-ga-bin.jar pause

You’ll see what’s wrong with it.

Read full topic

item.title: Run.bat
item.dc:creator: @_Devil : Devil :
item.description:
@_Devil wrote:

Solved = No

Question = I kept on running ‘Run.bat’ then my brother reinstled Java and now it does not work i have made sure the Envitment things are right and it is but when i open 'run.bat it just closses and jes i have JDk Update 14 Code in ‘Run.Bat’ =

@echo off color 81 title Devil From Heaven java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.14-ga-bin.jar

Compiler that works =

@echo off Title Devil From Heaven Updater "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin\javac.exe" *.java pause

Read full topic
